pkgmetadata.longdescription: Imputation Regularized Optimization Algorithm // Missing data are frequently encountered in high-dimensional data analysis, but they are usually difficult to deal with using standard algorithms, such as the EM algorithm and its variants. This package provides a general algorithm, the so-called Imputation Regularized Optimization (IRO) algorithm, for high-dimensional missing data problems. You can refer to Liang, F., Jia, B., Xue, J., Li, Q. and Luo, Y. (2018) at https://people.clas.ufl.edu/yeluo/files/ica10.pdf for detail. The publication "An Imputation Regularized Optimization Algorithm for High-Dimensional Missing Data Problems and Beyond" will be appear on Journal of the Royal Statistical Society Series B soon.
